name: javascript
text: Object Oriented approach, DOM manipulation, Ajax development, JSON format.

name: jquery
text: DOM manipulation, Ajax calls, Promises, Events, Effects and transitions, styles manipulation.

name: angularJS
text: Single Page Applications with a robust and modular approach. Also a little of backbone.js and ember.js.

name: HTML5
text: Semantic web, related APIs (drag and drop, svg, video, audio, canvas).

name: CSS3
text: Styles, transforms, transitions and animations, media queries.

name: Sass & Compass
text: Fast processing to standard CSS. Also a little of LESS, Stylus and Susy.

name: Twitter Bootstrap
text: Responsive design, mobile first approach, components configuration.

name: Laravel
text: MVC PHP framework with migrations, ORM, restful controllers and more. I also worked with Codeigniter.
